matrix
Class DVec

java.lang.Object
  matrix.DVec

public class DVec
extends java.lang.Object

Class for general dense vector. This class uses an external library called "MTJ".

Author:
Murat Artim

cross

public DVec cross(DVec arg0)
Performs cross (vector) product of two vectors. Can only be applied to two vectors having three dimensions. The result is again a vector with three dimensions.

Parameters:
arg0 - The second vector to be crossed.
Returns:
The vector product.
